price: 27 Pharaon dit : « Ce Messager qui vous est envoyé a perdu toute raison. »
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumu alladhī ur'sila ilaykum lamajnūnun
